header.title: About the Mission
header.desc: Discover the roots, vision, and the divine spiritual movement of All World Gayatri Pariwar.

mission.title: Our Core Mission
mission.desc: All World Gayatri Pariwar (AWGP) is a global movement dedicated to the moral, spiritual, and cultural awakening of humanity. Our mission is built on the profound triple foundation of reform:

atma.title: Self Transformation
atma.desc: Reform of the Self: Global transformation begins with the individual soul.

parivar.title: Family Transformation
parivar.desc: Reform of the Family: Building strong, value-based units for a stable society.

samaj.title: Society Transformation
samaj.desc: Reform of the Society: Creating a world based on mutual respect and divinity.

founders.title: The Souls Behind the Movement
founders.desc1: The mission was founded by Yug Rishi, Param Pujya Gurudev Pt. Shriram Sharma Acharya, who envisioned a new Golden Age along with the divine presence of Vandaniya Mata Bhagwati Devi Sharma.
founders.desc2: They dedicated every moment of their lives to the revival of Rishi culture and the spiritual upliftment of individuals across the globe.

branch.title: Bhiwandi Branch
branch.quote: "Serving the local community through regular Yagyas, Sanskars, spiritual discourses, and social welfare activities. We strive to bring the divine message of Gayatri and Yagya to every household."

legal.questions_text: Have specific questions regarding these terms?

terms.lead: "We are a community dedicated to spiritual growth. These terms ensure our platform remains a sanctuary for all."
terms.intro_text: By accessing the {brand} website, you consent to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should discontinue use of the site immediately.
terms.ip_text: Our content is our offering to the world, but we ask that you respect its source:
terms.ip_list_1_text: All spiritual texts, logos (excluding the global Gayatri Pariwar symbol), and media created by the Bhiwandi Branch are strictly our intellectual property.
terms.ip_list_2_text: You may share our "Daily Darshan" images and event photos personally and on social media, provided you do not alter them or claim them as your own.
terms.ip_list_3_text: You may not sell, license, or commercialize any content found on this website.
terms.guidelines_text: When interacting with our digital channels (including email or potential future comment sections):
terms.guidelines_list_1: Maintain respect and purity of speech (*Vani*).
terms.guidelines_list_2: Do not post unsolicited advertisements or spam.
terms.guidelines_list_3: Avoid political or divisive discussions; our focus is purely spiritual and social upliftment.
terms.liability_text: The information on this website constitutes spiritual guidance, not professional medical, legal, or financial advice. We are not liable for any decisions made based on the content provided here. Participation in events or Yagyas is voluntary.
terms.governance_text: These terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes related to the website shall be resolved amicably within the community framework whenever possible.

privacy.lead: Your privacy is sacred to us. We operate on principles of transparency and trust.
privacy.collect_text: Unlike commercial platforms, we collect minimal data:
privacy.collect_list_1_text: You do not need to create an account to view our content. We do not store passwords.
privacy.collect_list_2_text: If you email us, we only receive the info you choose to send (e.g., your Name/Email address).
privacy.usage_text: To keep the site running smoothly, our servers automatically log standard technical details:
privacy.usage_list_2: Approximate Location (Country/City) to see where our devotees are visiting from.
privacy.usage_list_3: Browser Language to serve you English, Hindi, Marathi, or Gujarati automatically.
privacy.cookies_list_1: ONE cookie to remember your Theme Preference (Dark/Light Mode).
privacy.cookies_list_2: ONE cookie to remember your Language Choice.
privacy.cookies_note: We do NOT use invasive advertising pixels or sell your data to third parties.
privacy.embedded_text: This site includes embedded videos from YouTube and maps from Google. When you interact with these specifically, those companies may track your interaction according to their own privacy policies.
privacy.security_text: We employ HTTPS encryption to ensure that your connection to our site is secure. Any voluntary data you share is accessible only to authorized branch volunteers.
